.techPage.conditions-page {
  background: #ffffff;
}

#site-header {
  z-index: 500;
}

.header-auth__item {
  display: flex;
  margin: 0 0 20px;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: flex-start;
  align-items: flex-start;
  width: 100%;
  height: auto;
  font-family: "Futura", sans-serif;
  font-weight: 700;
  font-size: 24px;
  line-height: 1.4;
  font-style: normal;
  color: #ffffff;
  font-style: normal;
  text-decoration: none;
}
.header-auth__item a {
  display: inline-flex;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  flex-direction: row;
  justify-content: flex-start;
  align-items: center;
  width: auto;
  height: auto;
  transition: all 100ms ease;
  -webkit-transition: all 100ms ease;
  -moz-transition: all 100ms ease;
  color: inherit;
  font: inherit;
}
.header-auth__item a img {
  display: block;
  margin: 0 10px;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  max-width: 18px;
  position: relative;
  bottom: 1px;
}
.header-auth__item a span {
  color: inherit;
  font: inherit;
  line-height: 1;
}
.header-auth__item a:hover {
  transition: all 100ms ease;
  -webkit-transition: all 100ms ease;
  -moz-transition: all 100ms ease;
  color: #fea375;
}
.header-auth__item a:active {
  transition: all 50ms ease;
  -webkit-transition: all 50ms ease;
  -moz-transition: all 50ms ease;
  color: #fea375;
}
.header-auth__item .item-account {
  min-width: 184px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}
.header-auth__item .item-logout {
  display: flex !important;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  flex-direction: row;
  justify-content: flex-start;
  align-items: center;
  width: 100%;
  height: auto;
  max-width: 20px;
}

.menu__order.btn {
  display: inline-flex;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  flex-direction: row;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  background: #f7864c;
  color: #ffffff;
  width: 130px;
  height: 36px;
  font-family: "Futura", sans-serif;
  font-weight: 400;
  font-size: 14px;
  line-height: 16px;
  font-style: normal;
  transition: all 190ms ease;
  -webkit-transition: all 190ms ease;
  -moz-transition: all 190ms ease;
  border-radius: 50px;
  box-shadow: 0 0 13px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
  cursor: pointer;
  letter-spacing: 0.7px;
  text-decoration: none;
  text-transform: none;
  outline: none;
}

  color: #ffffff;
}

  background: #fea375;
  color: #ffffff;
}

.header-menu {
  display: block;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 20px 15px 45px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  width: 100%;
  height: auto;
  transition: all 190ms linear;
  -webkit-transition: all 190ms linear;
  -moz-transition: all 190ms linear;
  transform-origin: top;
  transform: scaleY(0) scaleX(1);
  opacity: 0;
  background: #243a61;
  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  top: 100%;
  bottom: auto;
  z-index: 1;
}
.header-menu .menu-list {
  margin-bottom: 16px;
}
.header-menu .menu-list li {
  display: block;
  margin: 0 0 10px;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  font-family: "Futura", sans-serif;
  font-weight: 700;
  font-size: 24px;
  line-height: 1.4;
  font-style: normal;
  text-decoration: none;
}

  margin-bottom: 0;
}
.header-menu .menu-list li a {
  font: inherit;
  color: inherit;
  text-decoration: inherit;
  transition: all 100ms ease;
}
.header-menu .menu-list li a:hover {
  color: #fea375;
}
.header-menu .menu-list li a:active {
  color: #f7864c;
}
.header-menu.active {
  transform-origin: top;
  transform: scaleY(1) scaleX(1);
  opacity: 1;
}

.btn-burger {
  display: flex;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: space-around;
  align-items: center;
  width: 25px;
  height: 25px;
  transition: all 190ms ease;
  -webkit-transition: all 190ms ease;
  -moz-transition: all 190ms ease;
  transform: rotate(0);
  background: transparent;
  position: relative;
  cursor: pointer;
  border: none;
  box-shadow: none;
  outline: none;
  overflow: hidden;
}
.btn-burger span {
  display: block;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  width: 100%;
  height: 2px;
  transition: all 190ms ease;
  -webkit-transition: all 190ms ease;
  -moz-transition: all 190ms ease;
  background: #FFF;
  border-radius: 20px;
  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  z-index: 1;
}
.btn-burger span:nth-child(1) {
  top: 3px;
  transform: translateY(0) translateX(0) rotate(0);
}
.btn-burger span:nth-child(2) {
  top: 50%;
  transform: translateY(-50%) translateX(0) scaleX(1);
  opacity: 1;
}
.btn-burger span:nth-child(3) {
  bottom: 3px;
  transform: translateY(0) translateX(0) rotate(0);
}
.btn-burger:hover span {
  background: #a5d0c1;
}
.btn-burger:active span {
  background: #a5d0c1;
}
.btn-burger::selection {
  background: transparent;
}

.btn-burger.active {
  transform: rotate(90deg);
}
.btn-burger.active span:nth-child(1) {
  transform: translateY(8px) translateX(0.5px) rotate(45deg);
}
.btn-burger.active span:nth-child(2) {
  transform: translateY(-50%) translateX(25px) scaleX(0.5);
  opacity: 0;
}
.btn-burger.active span:nth-child(3) {
  transform: translateY(-9px) translateX(0) rotate(-45deg);
}

}

  transition: all 100ms ease;
}

  margin-bottom: 0;

}

}

}

  opacity: 1;
  transition: all 100ms ease;
}

  opacity: 1;
}

/*  --- Media Queries --- 656px --- */
@media screen and (min-width: 656px) {
  .container-footer {
    flex-direction: column;
  }

  .footer-page .footer-menu {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: row;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
  }
  .footer-page .footer-menu li {
    display: inline-flex;
    margin: 0 15px;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    flex-direction: row;
    justify-content: flex-start;
    align-items: center;
    width: auto;
    height: auto;
  }
}
/*  --- Media Queries --- 770px --- */
@media screen and (min-width: 770px) {
  .footer-page {
    padding: 30px 0 10px;
  }

  .footer-menu {
    margin-bottom: 10px;
  }
}
/*  --- Media Queries --- 900px --- */

    display: inline-flex;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    flex-direction: row;
    justify-content: flex-end;
    align-items: center;
    width: auto;
    height: auto;
  }
  .header-auth__wrap {
    display: inline-flex;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    flex-direction: row;
    justify-content: flex-end;
    align-items: center;
    width: auto;
    height: auto;
  }
  .header-auth__item {
    display: inline-flex;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0 0 0 25px;

    flex-direction: row;

    display: none;
  }

    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    position: static;
  }

    display: none;
  }

    display: none;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;

    content: "";
    display: none;
  }

    display: inline-flex;
    margin: 0 25px 0 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    flex-direction: row;
    justify-content: flex-end;
    align-items: center;
    width: auto;
    height: auto;
    position: relative;
  }

  .header-menu, .header-menu.active {
    display: flex;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    flex-direction: row;
    justify-content: flex-end;
    align-items: center;
    width: auto;
    height: auto;
    opacity: 1;
    transform: scaleX(1) scaleY(1);
    padding: 0;
    background: transparent;
    transition: none;
    position: static;
  }
  .header-menu .menu-list, .header-menu.active .menu-list {
    display: inline-flex;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    flex-direction: row;
    justify-content: flex-start;
    align-items: center;
  }
  .header-menu .menu-list li, .header-menu.active .menu-list li {
    display: inline-block;
    margin: 0 0 0 0;
    padding: 0 25px 0 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    font-family: "Futura", sans-serif;
    font-weight: 400;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 16px;
    font-style: normal;
    color: #fff;
    position: relative;
  }
  .header-menu .menu-list li::after, .header-menu.active .menu-list li::after {
    content: "";
    display: none;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    width: 1px;
    height: 35px;
    position: absolute;
    right: 0;
    top: 50%;
    transform: translateY(-50%);
    background: #d0d0d0;
  }
  .header-menu .menu-list li a, .header-menu.active .menu-list li a {
    display: inline;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    letter-spacing: 0.7px;
  }
  .header-menu .menu-list li:last-child, .header-menu.active .menu-list li:last-child {
    margin-right: 0;
  }
  .header-menu .menu-list li:last-child::after, .header-menu.active .menu-list li:last-child::after {
    display: block;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
  }

  .container-header {
    display: flex;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 0 15px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    flex-direction: row;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: center;
  }

  .menu__cat.btn.btn_2 {
    margin-left: 30px;
    margin-right: 20px;
  }

  .mail-wrap {
    display: flex;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    flex-direction: row;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
  }
}

    width: 120px;

    padding-right: 0;
  }

    display: flex;
    flex-direction: row-reverse;
  }

    padding-left: 30px;
    padding-right: 0;
    position: relative;
  }
  .header-auth__item::after {
    content: "";
    display: block;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    width: 1px;
    height: 35px;
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 50%;
    transform: translateY(-50%);

  }

    padding-right: 30px;
    margin-right: 0;
  }

  }

  }

    margin-right: 51px;
  }

    position: relative;
    bottom: 2px;
  }

    margin-right: 0;
    padding-right: 30px;
    opacity: 0.75;
  }

    display: flex;
    margin: 0 6px 0 0;
    padding: 0;

    top: 0;
  }

    opacity: 1;
  }

    transition: all 100ms ease;
    color: #ffffff;
  }
  .menu__phone.desk a:active {
    transition: all 100ms ease;
    opacity: 0.8;
    color: #ffffff;
  }

  .container-footer {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: row;
    max-width: 1366px;
  }

  .footer-page .logo {
    display: block;
    margin: 0 20px 0 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    width: 100%;
    height: auto;
  }
  .footer-page .footer-menu {
    display: grid;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    grid-auto-flow: column;
    grid-template-rows: 1fr 1fr;
    width: auto;
    grid-row-gap: 5px;
    grid-column-gap: 10px;
  }
  .footer-page .footer-menu li {
    display: inline-flex;
    margin: 0 20px 0 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    flex-direction: row;
    justify-content: flex-start;
    align-items: center;
    width: auto;
    height: auto;
    text-align: left;
    font-size: 12px;
  }
  .footer-page .footer-menu li:last-child {
    margin-right: 0;
  }
  .footer-page .footer-email {
    width: 265px;
  }

    max-width: 200px;
  }

    margin: 0;

  }

    width: 80px;
  }

    margin-left: auto;
    margin-right: 0;
  }
}

  }

    width: 100px;
    right: -50px;

  }
}

  }
